precondition: User is at the Windows XP desktop with no applications open.
action: Right-click on the desktop background and select 'Properties' from the context menu.
Select the 'Themes' tab and choose or modify a theme from the dropdown.
expected_results: A preview of the selected theme appears in the dialog box.

precondition: 'Display Properties' dialog box is open and a theme is selected.
action: Click 'Apply' or 'OK' to apply the selected theme.
expected_results: The desktop theme changes to the selected theme.

action: Navigate to the 'Screen Saver' tab and select a screen saver from the dropdown menu.
expected_results: A preview of the selected screen saver appears in the dialog box.

precondition: 'Display Properties' dialog box is open and a screen saver is selected.
action: Set the activation time and decide on password protection upon resumption.
expected_results: The screen saver settings are configured but not yet applied.

precondition: 'Display Properties' dialog box is open with configured screen saver settings.
action: Click 'Apply' or 'OK' to apply the screen saver settings.
expected_results: The screen saver settings are applied.

action: Navigate to the 'Power Schemes' tab and select the 'Home/Office Desk' scheme.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' dialog box opens with the 'Home/Office Desk' scheme selected.

precondition: 'Power Options Properties' dialog box is open and 'Home/Office Desk' scheme is selected.
action: Adjust the 'Turn off monitor' setting to the desired time of inactivity.
expected_results: The 'Turn off monitor' setting is configured but not yet applied.

precondition: 'Power Options Properties' dialog box is open with configured power settings.
action: Click 'Apply' or 'OK' to apply the power settings.

precondition: 'Power Options Properties' dialog box is open.
action: Adjust all power settings to 'Never' to prevent automatic power-saving features.
expected_results: All power settings are configured to 'Never', avoiding automatic power-saving interruptions.

precondition: 'Power Options Properties' dialog box is open with all power settings adjusted to 'Never'.
action: Click 'OK' or 'Apply' to finalize the changes.
expected_results: The customized power scheme is applied, preventing automatic power-saving features.
